short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension integrates BookWidgets into Google Classroom.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Create fun and interactive exercises for Chromebooks, iPads, tablets and PC. Right inside of Google Classroom!

Interactive graphs, dynamic worksheets, and completely automatically graded exercises and tests.

With BookWidgets, you can make over 40 different types of exercises, right inside of the familiar Google Classroom environment. Whether it's small exercises to supplement a textbook, complete lessons or elaborate web quests, with BookWidgets you finally have the tools you need to provide a tailored learning experience.

Combine sources, text, video, quizzes and interactive widgets to let students learn and practice at their own pace.
Track the work and evolution of your students over time. All student work is automatically graded, but you can of course override where needed, for instance to account for dyslexic students.

When you're done, you return the graded work, including your feedback with a click. The grades automatically make their way into the gradebook.

BookWidgets is completely free for students. Only teachers that use BookWidgets need a paid license. For pricing info, please see https://www.bookwidgets.com/pricing
